sdata.j: ↑車↑↓くるま↓の|↑前面|↑↓ぜんめん↓ガラスは↑砕↑↓くだ↓けて↑粉々↑↓こなごな↓になった。
sdata.e: The front windshield of a car was smashed to pieces.

sdata.e: The flat, dish-shaped bone in front of the knee joint is called the patella.
